name: Avoid unreferenced Process Activities (TIBCO BW)
description: This metric retrieves all Tibco Process Activities that are not referenced i.e. not used by Tibco code.
output:
This report lists all Number of Tibco Process Activities that are not referenced.
It provides the following information:
Tibco Process Activity full name
rationale: Unreferenced Process Activities like any other example of dead code make maintenance more difficult and more expensive.
remediation: Check if the Process Activities are going to be used. If not, then remove them.
